import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import classes from './CartItem.module.css' import React, { useState, useRef, useEffect} from 'react'; const CartItem = (props) =>{ console.log(props) const countRef = useRef() var count = props.shirt_counts useEffect(()=> { countRef.current.value = count }) function updateCount() { var newCount = countRef.current.value console.log(countRef.current.value) console.log(props.id) props.updateItemCount(props.id, newCount) count = newCount } return (

{props.shirt_name}

Quantity:
Color:
{props.shirt_color}
Size:
{props.shirt_size}
Price(each):
{props.shirt_price}
 ); }; export default CartItem
